content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Good to meet you, Max. Thank you for considering my apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 1000 Euros. Can you give me an offer?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Max. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would be willing to offer you a rental price of 1200 Euros per month. This price includes all utilities and maintenance costs. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: That's a bit higher than my budget. I was hoping for something closer to 800 Euros. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your concerns, Max. Unfortunately, I am not able to lower the rental price any further as it would not be profitable for me. However, I would be willing to discuss other possible options with you to make the rental more affordable. Would you be interested in signing a longer lease term or sharing the apartment with another tenant?
name: Heinrich Heine
